title: How to cancel account after a year with freedom debt relief?
question: Just checked account and out of $260 I am only paying $10 to debt while $250 going to agency.
answers: First, read the contract that you signed with the debt settlement company. You may be required to give them notice of cancellation. Next, stop making payments to them. If you agree to an automatic ACH payment from your bank account, cancel that. You can then start negotiating directly with creditors and pay the creditors instead.
